entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
